trans-unit.source: Represents a date selection range in a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un intervallo di selezione data in un controllo calendario mensile.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionRange is the date or dates selected and highlighted on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Il SelectionRange rappresenta la data o le date selezionate ed evidenziate nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>

trans-unit.source: If only one date is selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values will be equal.
trans-unit.target: Se è selezionata una data, solo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>i valori delle proprietà sarà uguali.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SelectionRange can be changed by the user clicking a date while dragging the mouse pointer across the desired dates, or you can set the range in code.
trans-unit.target: Il SelectionRange può essere modificato dall'utente facendo clic su una data mentre si trascina il puntatore del mouse sopra le date desiderate oppure è possibile impostare l'intervallo nel codice.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to have the user enter a date range into two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls or two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> controls and set the SelectionRange based on those dates.
trans-unit.target: Potrebbe ad esempio, si desidera che l'utente debba immettere un intervallo di date in due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlli o due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>controlli e i set di SelectionRange in base a tali date.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> values are set to `null` when this constructor is used.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>valori vengono impostati su `null` quando questo costruttore viene utilizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref> class with the specified selection range.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"> </xref> classe con l'intervallo di selezione specificati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are assigned the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values of the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>vengono assegnati i valori delle proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>i valori delle proprietà dell'oggetto assegnato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The existing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esistente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref> class with the specified beginning and ending dates.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"> </xref> classe con l'iniziale e finale specificate date.

trans-unit.source: The starting date in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La data di inizio nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ending date in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La data di fine nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending date and time of the selection range.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la data e l'ora dell'intervallo di selezione finale.

trans-unit.source: The ending <xref:System.DateTime> value of the range.
trans-unit.target: Il termine <xref:System.DateTime>valore dell'intervallo.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting date and time of the selection range.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la data di inizio e ora dell'intervallo di selezione.

trans-unit.source: The starting <xref:System.DateTime> value of the range.
trans-unit.target: L'avvio <xref:System.DateTime>valore dell'intervallo.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una stringa che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ToString restituisce una stringa che include i valori per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"> </xref>.
